favourite.article: Christians, let us watch and pray. Jesus is coming very soon. We shall not be found wanting when He comes in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading this song and God bless you all. Peace!!!
As we approach these End Times - Remember we do not want to be caught off guard when the Master returns. We should always Watch and Pray!

Last night while half asleep, I kept hearing the first and last line "Christian seek ye not repose, watch and pray". I didn't understand at first but it kept ringing in my ears. And then I was fully awake and paid attention. I realised I was being alerted by the Holy Spirit of God. It's been a very long time I heard that song, over 10 years ago. And all of a sudden, hear it was resounding in my ear...

Oh God, help us Christians to be the light of the world that darkness will never overcome. Revive us again oh Lord and help us to do Your will. Empower us to watch and pray in Jesus wonderful name. Amen.

Oh Lord help us to watch and pray always in Jesus Name. Give us the Grace to be obedient to the voice of God in Jesus Name. Hide Your words in our hearts that we might not sin against You oh Lord in Jesus Name. Temptations will not overcome us in Jesus Name but we shall be overcomers in Jesus. Amen. I pray that God will help us not to enter into temptation in Jesus Name. Thanks for uploading thins song and God bless you all. Shalom!!!
I saw this hymn in our daily manna this morning and it confirmed the teaching we hard yesterday from bible Study, Thou art in the midst of foes: Watch and pray. God bless the composer.

This morning was a very dull one for me. I was crying and contemplating about my spouse's abusive nature when the I heard a voice within me saying, 'watch and pray.' I knew it was a hymn and I looked it up to get the actual message in its fullness. May God bless the city composer.
This is a Divine alert and a wake up call.

Blessed be the writer of this hymn. Seemingly, gone are the days when hymns were a meaningful part of Christian worship and lives are transformed. These days, we hear more noise in churches which obviously lacks the power to change lives. Please take me back to the times of refreshing when there's no room to slumbering. God bless you.

This hymn blesses my soul, putting me on guard at all time, knowing that ambushed lie the evil ones. Reminding me of the need to watch and pray. It's a timely warning, an encouraging hymn for every Christian to have and sing. God Bless you richly.
What a dreadful lost of these soul challenging sermonets from the modern day Christian churches. We do need to seek for the old path and walk in it.

Greetings Hymnal Net,
Blessed happy new year 2014 to you and all listening and learning this vital hymn as in Matthew 26 verse 41. At our local resident London CFT Churches in New Cross and Woolwich Cathedral we have been taught this very important hymn by our Spiritual Father, Apostle Alfred Williams. This comes at a time when songs or hymns rather like this are rarely sung enough with full understanding and he [our Father in the Lord, Apostle Williams] has even said, 'Any hymn book without this hymn is not a hymn book'. I can see and understand fully why. Please make full words always available plus people or someone singing it. As even youtube does not have these words which shows, the world don't want us Christians 'to seek not yet repose'.
All glory be to the Lord God Almighty JESUS Christ of Nazareth!
Agape Love;
Disciple Samuel Georgewill Usher & Choir Member at Christ Faith Tabernacle International Churches London Branches www.cftchurches.org

This blessed hymn reminds me the need of prayers in every situation as we continue [church/member] on this pilgrimage here. God bless hymnal.net and the saints as we use these songs. Thanks and God's grace to all users.
